comment: The apartment was also cleaned very well and the fridge/freezer taken to the waste disposal centre by Gerry. In a rented apartment taking it upon yourself to dispose of the fridge/freezer sure is an interesting action.
amr:
# ::snt The apartment was also cleaned very well and the fridge/freezer taken to the waste disposal centre by Gerry. In a rented apartment taking it upon yourself to dispose of the fridge/freezer sure is an interesting action.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / clean-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / apartment)
                  :ARG1-of (w / well-09
                        :degree (v / very))
                  :mod (a3 / also))
            :op2 (t / take-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Gerry"))
                  :ARG1 (s / slash
                        :op1 (f / fridge)
                        :op2 (f2 / freezer))
                  :ARG3 (c2 / center
                        :purpose (d / dispose-01
                              :ARG1 (w2 / waste)))))
      :snt2 (a4 / action
            :ARG1-of (ii / interest-01)
            :domain (t2 / take-on-09
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (d2 / dispose-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 s)
                  :location (a5 / apartment
                        :ARG1-of (r / rent-01)))
            :ARG1-of (s2 / sure-02)))
